summary:
He will wander the land...
Will you be able to find and defeat him?
descriptionHtml:
I have created this small mod that adds a wandering wizard to your world.
At the moment he does not drop very good items and i belive he is a little overpowered.
His starting position is in the \'\'Bee and barb\'\' in riften.From there he will wander the lands.

Sorry guys! Seems like tho mod have stoped working after the latest patch!
I will see if i can fix it eventually.
author: Simslash
